title: "LOL CLIENT HAS STOPPED WORKING" PLS HELP!
body: every time i get into que an error pops up and closes down league of legends, ive tried updating java script and running as administrator but neither have worked...

replies.body: Failing to join the queue may be caused for a few reasons.  For example, remove any third party programs like play.tv as they've been known to cause issues with the client.  You may also have network issue losing connection to our server, which will result in that error and close out.  For this, your best bet would be to use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
